languages.text: "Я наконец понял, зачем нужен ксенос в свите — чтобы было кому подойти и проверить, действительно ли эта дрянь мертва".
languages.translation_comment:
On Epitath, seeing a pile of dead Necrons.
Marazhai: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."

traits.locale_text: "Я наконец понял, зачем нужен ксенос в свите — чтобы было кому подойти и проверить, действительно ли эта дрянь мертва".

languages.text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."
languages.translation_comment:
On Epitath, seeing a pile of dead Necrons.
Marazhai: "Strange. Oghyr bodies disappear after death. These specimens must be defective in some way, as they are still here."
languages.original_text: "Я наконец понял, зачем нужен ксенос в свите — чтобы было кому подойти и проверить, действительно ли эта дрянь мертва".

traits.locale_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."
"I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."
"I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."
"I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."
"I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."
"I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."

languages.text: 「どうして随行に異種族が必要なのか、やっとわかった。ああいう何かに近づいて、本当に死んでるか確かめに行かせるためだな」
languages.original_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."

traits.locale_text: 「どうして随行に異種族が必要なのか、やっとわかった。ああいう何かに近づいて、本当に死んでるか確かめに行かせるためだな」

languages.text: "Ich habe endlich erkannt, warum wir einen Xenos im Gefolge brauchen. Damit jemand nachsehen kann, ob das Ding da auch wirklich tot ist, was es auch sein mag."
languages.original_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe endlich erkannt, warum wir einen Xenos im Gefolge brauchen. Damit jemand nachsehen kann, ob das Ding da auch wirklich tot ist, was es auch sein mag."

languages.text: « J'ai enfin compris pourquoi nous avions besoin d'un xénos à nos côtés : pour que quelqu'un s'approche de cette chose et vérifie qu'elle est bien morte. »
languages.original_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai enfin compris pourquoi nous avions besoin d'un xénos à nos côtés : pour que quelqu'un s'approche de cette chose et vérifie qu'elle est bien morte. »

languages.text: «Por fin me he dado cuenta de por qué necesitamos un xenos en el séquito: para tener a alguien que se acerque a ese tipo de cosas y compruebe si está muerto de verdad».
languages.original_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin me he dado cuenta de por qué necesitamos un xenos en el séquito: para tener a alguien que se acerque a ese tipo de cosas y compruebe si está muerto de verdad».

languages.text: “我终于明白为什么这支队伍里需要异形了——为了让异形走到这玩意儿旁边，看看它是不是真的死了。”
languages.original_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."

traits.locale_text: “我终于明白为什么这支队伍里需要异形了——为了让异形走到这玩意儿旁边，看看它是不是真的死了。”

languages.text: "Maiyetimizde neden bir zeno olması gerektiğini şimdi anlıyorum. Sonuçta ölmüşler mi diye ceset kontrol edecek biri lazım."
languages.original_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."

traits.locale_text: "Maiyetimizde neden bir zeno gerektiğini şimdi anlıyorum. Sonuçta cesetleri ölmüşler mi diye kontrol edecek biri lazım."

languages.original_text: "I've finally realised why we need a xenos in the retinue — to have someone walk up to whatever that is and check if it's really dead."
